IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO INSPIRE, ENTERTAIN AND OPEN MINDS BY CREATING TRANSFORMATIVE THEATRE EXPERIENCES FOR ALL. KCREP WILL BE A CATALYST FOR A CULTURALLY VIBRANT, EQUITABLE, AND THRIVING KANSAS CITY BY CONNECTING ARTISTS AND AUDIENCES IN A WELCOMING ENVIRONMENT THAT FOSTERS WONDER, CURIOSITY, AND UNDERSTANDING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO INSPIRE, ENTERTAIN AND OPEN MINDS BY CREATING TRANSFORMATIVE THEATRE EXPERIENCES FOR ALL.
IRS990.Desc: KANSAS CITY REPERTORY THEATRE PRODUCED 6 PLAYS THROUGHOUT THE SEASON. THERE WERE 120 PERFORMANCES, REACHING 27,110 PATRONS, AND 23 SCHOOL MATINEES (AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMING), REACHING 3,017 STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED INVESTMENT AND SPENDING POLICIES FOR ENDOWMENT ASSETS THAT ATTEMPT TO PROVIDE A PREDICTABLE STREAM OF FUNDING TO PROGRAMS AND ORGANIZATIONAL EXPENSES SUPPORTED BY ITS ENDOWMENTS WHILE SEEKING TO MAINTAIN THE PURCHASING POWER OF THE ENDOWMENT ASSETS.

THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C) (3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. UNCERTAIN TAX PROVISIONS, IF ANY, ARE RECORDED IN ACCORDANCE WITH FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD (FASB) ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION (ASC) 740, INCOME TAXES, WHICH REQUIRE THE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY FOR TAX POSITIONS TAKEN THAT DO NOT MEET THE MORE-LIKELYTHAN-NOT STANDARD THAT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE ORGANIZATION'S OPEN EXAMINATION PERIODS ARE 2019 AND FORWARD. THERE IS NO LIABILITY FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS RECORDED AT JUNE 30, 2022 OR 2021.
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND DIRECTOR OF FINANCE ENSURE THE SUBMISSION TO THE IRS OF FORM 990 AFTER IT HAS BEEN REVIEWED BY THE BOARD MEMBERS.
A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM IS DISTRIBUTED ANNUALLY TO EVERY BOARD MEMBER AND SUBMITTED TO THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW AND IDENTIFIED ISSUES ARE EVALUATED.

KCREP HAS A BOARD, HR AND COMPENSATION COMMITTEE THAT REVIEWS INDUSTRY DATA TO DETERMINE SALARY FOR BOTH EXECUTIVES. REVIEWS ARE MADE ANNUALLY. THE ARTISTIC DIRECTOR AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION ARE BOTH APPROVED BY UMKC, AN INDEPENDENT PARTY.
THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
